text: The 1990 East Coast Conference (Division I) Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 3–5, 1990. The champion gained and an automatic berth to the NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket and results== ==References== Category:East Coast Conference (Division I) Men's Basketball Tournament Category:1989–90 East Coast Conference (Division I) men's basketball season
title: 1990 East Coast Conference (Division I) Men's Basketball Tournament
